i needed tireless mouse for my new malbrook pro that only has us connections this mouse included an adapted that allowed the standard us bluetooth receiver to be used in the us port have only had an opportunity to use it in limited situations thus far but it seems very responsive and performed well the led lights are kind cool but not really needed trying to see if there is way to use the mouse without the led lights on so can conserve the charge on the battery the only concern issue ve had thus far is that the charging cable connection to the mouse and the adapted don seem to be the most secure and couple times it seemed like the connection came loose and the mouse was no longer charging was still using my lawton while the mouse was charging via the us port as recommended in the user manual the user manual specifically recommends not using plug in charging adapted like for most cell phone because it might overcharge the mouse and damage it it is recommended that you only use the provided cable and charge it via your lawton to avoid overhanging and damaging the mouse not certain how great an option this is since it seems to come loose and stop charging occasionally if continue to use my lawton while trying to charge the mouse we ll see how it goes in the future if it turns out that it was operator error may update my rating overall though the mouse feels good in my hand and it seems to work well doing everything necessary when need it

this mouse looked promising based on all the positive reviews it is light good to hold and has good battery life it is also quiet with exceptions see below its main problem however is that the middle button the scrollwheel becomes unable after only short amount of use after which the button needs to be pressed repeatedly in order to register button press also compared to the limb mb buttons which are sometimes too light and register button presses accidentally the mob is extremely rigid in comparison it is also very noisy which is ironic as the other two buttons are completely silent it is much more noisy than other mice have used which is about as someone who relief on this button during daily usage this is very frustration and frankly serious design flaw like to emphasize that the mouse has been treated well not rough also bought the non led version of this mouse and the exact same problem appeared after the same amount of time another drawback is that the mouse does not indicate when the battery is low leaving one to guess when to charge it it often becomes erratic mouse pointer moves around and does not register movement well requiring power cycle this is occuring on more than one system all in all decent attempt but quite few issues need to be droned out doubt the many positive reviews for this product have been based on any more than couple of weeks usage as these issues are consistent and appeared after months frankly expect mouse to last significantly longer and also have unable middle mouse button hope these issues get addressed by the manufacturer

a rechargeable careless mouse is such good idea and invention you don have to deal with batteries and this mouse seemed not to need charging for over day great this one bought worked well even though it did something odd and am not sure if it was the mouse or the expensive tablet computers that use or maybe the us splinters that use however it was probably the mouse but after using the mouse normally for few hours the mouse would then not show the arrow on the screen and found that would have to turn off the watch on the mouse and then turn it back on again it was as if had to re boot the mouse periodically it seemed to have nothing to do with charging this would happen even after the mouse had been fully charged it would be predictable as to when it would happen but overall even that was minor flaw but then one day actually the date of this writing march put the mouse receiver into different receptacle to use different tablet computer and it would not work no matter what tried to do then decided to take out the receiver from the us receptacle and found that the metal square part on the receiver stuck into the us receptacle so this leads me to believe that possibly the mouse receiver became faulty with regular use over few weeks since bought it otherwise the way that the receiver was made was not in the best possible way not rugged enough maybe however though don know at this point if this is the way that all these rechargeable houses are this brand or if this particular one that bought just did not actually pass quality control at the factory it seems the company should give me replacement am going to see about it but guess will be told that the deadline for returns had been reached will update if am able to

i needed tireless mouse for my new malbrook pro that only has us connections this mouse included an adapted that allowed the standard us bluetooth receiver to be used in the us port have only had an opportunity to use it in limited situations thus far but it seems very responsive and performed well the led lights are kind cool but not really needed trying to see if there is way to use the mouse without the led lights on so can conserve the charge on the battery the only concern issue ve had thus far is that the charging cable connection to the mouse and the adapted don seem to be the most secure and couple times it seemed like the connection came loose and the mouse was no longer charging was still using my lawton while the mouse was charging via the us port as recommended in the user manual the user manual specifically recommends not using plug in charging adapted like for most cell phone because it might overcharge the mouse and damage it it is recommended that you only use the provided cable and charge it via your lawton to avoid overhanging and damaging the mouse not certain how great an option this is since it seems to come loose and stop charging occasionally if continue to use my lawton while trying to charge the mouse we ll see how it goes in the future if it turns out that it was operator error may update my rating overall though the mouse feels good in my hand and it seems to work well doing everything necessary when need it

this mouse looked promising based on all the positive reviews it is light good to hold and has good battery life it is also quiet with exceptions see below its main problem however is that the middle button the scrollwheel becomes unable after only short amount of use after which the button needs to be pressed repeatedly in order to register button press also compared to the limb mb buttons which are sometimes too light and register button presses accidentally the mob is extremely rigid in comparison it is also very noisy which is ironic as the other two buttons are completely silent it is much more noisy than other mice have used which is about as someone who relief on this button during daily usage this is very frustration and frankly serious design flaw like to emphasize that the mouse has been treated well not rough also bought the non led version of this mouse and the exact same problem appeared after the same amount of time another drawback is that the mouse does not indicate when the battery is low leaving one to guess when to charge it it often becomes erratic mouse pointer moves around and does not register movement well requiring power cycle this is occuring on more than one system all in all decent attempt but quite few issues need to be droned out doubt the many positive reviews for this product have been based on any more than couple of weeks usage as these issues are consistent and appeared after months frankly expect mouse to last significantly longer and also have unable middle mouse button hope these issues get addressed by the manufacturer

a rechargeable careless mouse is such good idea and invention you don have to deal with batteries and this mouse seemed not to need charging for over day great this one bought worked well even though it did something odd and am not sure if it was the mouse or the expensive tablet computers that use or maybe the us splinters that use however it was probably the mouse but after using the mouse normally for few hours the mouse would then not show the arrow on the screen and found that would have to turn off the watch on the mouse and then turn it back on again it was as if had to re boot the mouse periodically it seemed to have nothing to do with charging this would happen even after the mouse had been fully charged it would be predictable as to when it would happen but overall even that was minor flaw but then one day actually the date of this writing march put the mouse receiver into different receptacle to use different tablet computer and it would not work no matter what tried to do then decided to take out the receiver from the us receptacle and found that the metal square part on the receiver stuck into the us receptacle so this leads me to believe that possibly the mouse receiver became faulty with regular use over few weeks since bought it otherwise the way that the receiver was made was not in the best possible way not rugged enough maybe however though don know at this point if this is the way that all these rechargeable houses are this brand or if this particular one that bought just did not actually pass quality control at the factory it seems the company should give me replacement am going to see about it but guess will be told that the deadline for returns had been reached will update if am able to

first off this keyboard has been nice to type on considering the price at first the keys were bit too soft and required slightly more pressure to press but as type more on it they loosened up and now feel great the keys feel click but soft enough where it not loud to type the space bar is bit louder but not as loud compared to other keyboard works great as an external keyboard for my windows and mac captors do wish the max brightness of the keys was higher as it not as bright when the room light is on also it would be nice to have the option to change the colors of the lights like other keyboard that are around the same price range or cheaper lastly it would be slightly less annoying to have the option to use the media keys without needing to press the fn key for mass on my malbrook pro with move was able to change the settings to where the curl key functions as the command key on mac you simply go to system references keyboard modified keys and ensure that the correct keyboard is selected on the top next to select keyboard for me it was tireless receiver once the correct keyboard is selected changed the control key to command and changed the command key to control now the curl key functions as the command key however the windows key functions as the command key by default so these steps are not necessary if you re okay using the windows key overall would recommend it if you re on budget and don mind some of the drawback mentioned still great keyboard and battery life is pretty good

this is good looking keyboard the rainbow colors you see are all you can get so no selection of one color is available although the brightness settings are adjustable which is nice not critical issue as said it nice looking keyboard but functional there are couple of issues that are immediately apparent first the enter key as in the picture attached has notch in it that is shared with the key am constantly hitting the and enter resulting in failed password and clusters chat messages so at minimum it will take some time to get used to this and hit the enter key alone another issue seems to be battery life instructions indicate hours to charge can accept that what can accept is the life of the battery after in the short time have had this keyboard it has died on my twice within day of getting full charge so sleep function is either broken or poorly designed with regard to maintaining battery life so now am keeping it wired with the provided cable because cannot be without keyboard when it dies and plugging it into power source is not enough once the battery is dead it will not power up until it has gotten enough of charge to respond but connected to the pp via us cable makes it online instantly overall poor technical design my only other complaint and it could just be me adapting from lawton keyboard to mechanical desktop keyboard again but tying on this keyboard continues to feel clumsy but while writing this review took moment to look closer the keys on this keyboard are probably good smaller surface area than either lawton typically use this adds to the closeness of the keys and why am constantly off key here and there tying as normally do by feel alone square key up from the base versus the pyramids shape of these keys would make them bigger and more tolerable this is what may ultimately force me to try another keyboard and send this one back

update after or of usage used the keyboard almost everyday for whole year mostly for work rather than gazing and it is still like new then one day had to switch out my lawton at work and forgot to take the us receiver before turning it in unfortunately couldn retrieve it and was beating myself up for it going back to using the lawton keys was highly excruciating so decided to take chance and ask if the us receiver was replaceable their customer service is phenomena the same rep communicated with me throughout the process have you ever played hot potato with customer service then you know how amazing this feels and she always responded pretty quickly to my email there was never law time the only hiccup ran into was at the very beginning when searched for customer service portal through amazon the initial link connected me with the slim technical riding gear rather than slim technologies however they gave me the correct email address immediately and it was smooth sailing from there they told me the us receiver is replaceable yayyyy but that part was on backorder was more happy to know be able to continue using the keyboard so was willing to wait month later they provided an update that the part was still on backorder but that they were going to send me new one it arrived as promised and can go back to tying comfortably and with lightning speed just got it and have only used it for couple of hours but thoroughly impressed by this keyboard smooth buttons smooth tying comfortable feel and full sized buttons and now have number key pad the presentation was also impressive black little envelope with seemingly personalized note with little flare from the makers when you open the box love it just the quality of the keys make it obvious that it will be great for game play the keys feel so light and smooth under my fingers as type hope it lasts forever

the keyboard itself as keyboard works fine however there are few things that need improvement the backlight needs to be brighter and the individual keys need to stay like up even when the backlight fades out need to give the user the option to select to keep the back light on constantly instead of just fading or off user that likes the back light to stay on not fan of the fading in out as it makes it hard to see the keys in the dark especially if trying to find numbers and symbols the enter key is too far to the right for comfortable tying selection meaning that the enter key should be where the key is normal keyboard have the enter key closer in this position so when tying we easily select the right key but you have the key where the enter key should be so it interferes and causes us to hit the wrong key the keyboard isn that quiet hitting the keys when tying softly the keys still make lot of noise

it an ok product for the most part there are few things that noticed that lead me to give this product only stars the sleep time on the led feature is too short and not adjustable it turns off the led lights after about seconds and if you re trying to use it in the dark this defeats the purpose of getting an illuminated keyboard there should be an ability to leave it on the brightness on the led lights is not very good in completely dark room it may be possible but in room with partial illumination like lamp or even the light from your to monitor screen the keys get little lost and not easy to see since they blend with the glare from the screen the stroma colors make such dimly lit product that much harder to see and you can adjust this it would be better if you could make it just green white or blue lights but the stroma color runs across the keyboard and the red color is very dim to top it off the less are so far under the keys that you get more of halo effect around the undermine of the key than lighting up the key characters themselves the only pro have about this product are the price cheap for what it is the quiet no click of the keys perfect if someone else is in the room trying to sleep us charge compatible aside from the things mentioned at the top of this post there are some extra that could have made this product better dedicated buttons for ff rev play pause vol up down mute having to constantly press function button for basic features like those when you want to control music or volume is annoying removable rechargeable batteries you can replace and charge in the unit when the charge is plugged in had mouse that did this and it was great feature and when the battery could no longer hold charge just replaced it the the done is awesome but also having bluetooth option can make this better and able to connect to devices that don have us ports but keep the done not happy with mine will return it and spend little more on better solution for me

this keyboard is thoroughly average you press keys and the computer reacts there are no stitches the backlight turns on so you can see the keys in the dark as advertised unless it goes to sleep there is nothing to set this keyboard apart in fact it is lacking in some ways for example there is no way to determine how much matter power you have left which is excusable for tireless gazing input device there is nothing worse than discovering your keyboard is dead in the middle of gazing session they did not even need to write software to display this information windows can display it if the device simply provides it am also not fan of the key layout they got creative with the placement of the backwash key instead of being in its normal position above the enter key they pushed the quote key to the left and jammed backwash in between that and enter enter has been stretched up to backspace the end result is that if you try to type backwash or pipe characters say when entering paths or escape characters or coming you wind up hitting the enter key instead possibly times since you re tying without looking on instinct don know how many times have tried to type in path an inadvertently submitted the wrong path to the os by pressing enter instead of backwash very frustration the quote key being shifted to the left is also very annoying but not quite as bad if you are developer this keyboard will slow you down for this reason alone particularly if you then go to work and use keyboard with standard layout maybe others are different but the absolute last thing want in keyboard is less than standard key layout it renders useless years of accumulated intuition and experience

i originally ordered this keyboard just over years ago and was and still am very happy with the product the product is lightweight the keys feel nice and they are pretty quiet like that it has the separate number pad but the whole keyboard is not too large or bulky the rechargeable battery lasted longer than expected so was able to take advantage of the tireless feature when the battery does die you can still use the keyboard while it is plugged in and charging and the battery light on the top right corner turns off when its charged the rainbow colour lights behind the keys are nice touch too am not game though so have no comment on its features for that purpose just recently the battery started to die more frequently and had to plug it in more often which was not the end of the world for me as most keyboard require cords anyway however the battery eventually started to expand and the keyboard warped and became unable went back to my amazon order and checked to see if there was warranty and there was years reached out to customer service via email with pictures of the keyboard and my original voice they responded within the same day and offered me replacement have the replacement now and still love it the company has provided exceptional customer service they were very responsive and they stand behind their product they even checked in with me to make sure that received the replacement and that it was working as expected

this is specifically for the green and black benton professional gazing heads the quality of this heads for the price is near unbearable heads feels very unable kid proof it made of as plastic with metal insects on the adjustable band the ear cushions on these are leather pillow cushions and they are extremely comfortable have an absolutely huge head and these fit just right the ear cups fit over my ears entirely and they do decent job of blocking out absent sound the heads is very light weight making it very comfortable to use for long play sessions had no ear or head pain from wearing these for extended periods of time the integrated volume control and mute switch work very well the cord is extra long ft and it braided the entire way this cord feels pretty premium and even has velcro cord wrap on it it comes with pp splitter just in case you have set like that the us only powers the led lights and they are very green therefore the us does not have to be plugged in but is nice touch if you re into that sort of thing personally really like the lights and think they are nice but don use them every time either microphone quality is very good and the noise concealing system seems to work extremely well on it only time echo was noticed was when volume was at and even then it was not bad at all went through numerous headsets in the last three weeks trying to find microphone that didn echo all my friends voices back at the slightest sound of speech seriously it was pathetic how garage the microphone are on the expensive hyper and bacon fig headsets sound quality is superb for the price point these are pretty bass heavy if you like that sort of thing very reminiscence of skullcandy sound quality like this type of sound myself because in shorter you literally feel the bass with this heads high are also good if not little less pronounced and had no problem hearing footsteps in shutters in games like fortunate that exactly what you want these also sound very well with direction audit like doubt atoms so definitely recommend these for surround sound gazing as well my one minor complaint is that the cord for the us is not long enough and it did not come with an extended that small price to pay though considering everything else is so good about these headphones now own multiple benton products this is brand trust in not only are they quality brand but their customer service is absolutely excellent wouldn hesitate to buy this brand for any of your audit needs

complaints there my main issues are how incredibly cheap they feel and how clumsy the microphone is the store page claims it has noise isolation to better pick up your voice but from my basic voice recording tests comparing my lawton and this microphone my lawton consistently provides louder clearer results compared to this heads there was still quite noticeable background noise in the heads recording as well there also some design flaws with how the microphone is implements it is completely rigid peace of plastic that only rotated vertically so it just ends up hanging good to inches from your mouth when deployed yes got out ruler and measured it that off this is compared to other heads miss which can be adjusted as needed to sit much closer and in front of your mouth instead of beside it the cheap feeling is the next biggest flaw simply put the glossy plastic used on the exterior of the muff housing reminds me of cheap toy the case on the connecting band is bit better being made from matter plastic but not by much the only things on this device that don feel like they were slapped together for as low material cost as possible are the ear mouths and the braided cord which comes with nice plastic protectors for both the mm audit jack and the us that powers the contractual obliged game lights have honestly foregone the lights for better build quality on the muff housing and microphone that actually somewhat flexible so can actually hear myself speak overall average playback quality nothing that would impress an audiophile but nowhere near terrible it painfully average and unfortunately that more than can be said for the rest of the device bad microphone design and quality just don bother got better results from the built in microphone array in my thinkpad from than did with this thing el cheap feel like toy from dollar store verdict if you care about quality in your heads don buy this they sell this thing for at regular price got it for about half off with the amazon prime discount even still somewhat regret spending money on this thing and be leagues more disappointed had paid the full asking price for it it barely worth it weight at is dollars and there no way it worth the normal if you just want something for discreet audit playback go find better heads or just settle for some earbuds there plenty of decent option for the latter under both in retail stores and online this one isn worth your time or your money the only reason even keeping this is because returning products has always been pain in my experience and because the heads unlike most people who use speakers like this for fun used it for work as feet express courier not only did our bigger trunks not have working climate controls arm rests cruise control or induration from the elements we don have speakers imagine hours on the road in loud tin can shaking and rattling every which way with no music to soothe your stress so one night decided no more of that this speaker fit right into the passengers seat and would strap the seatbelt just incise the trunks had world class terrible suspension the smallest bump in the road would send anything not strapped down flying with that at full volume in the truck that battery might last around or hours but man oh man on full volume it would tune out the road noise tin can truck doors rattling against the metal body everything it made my driving experience so much better that being said would only need full volume on the highway did you know express trunks are governed to may well assuming our trunks could even easily reach that at least in my station they all had check engine lights and once timed that it took seconds to go from may to may fun and when was driving from may having the speaker at was fine at that rate could make it last about hours before needing charge thank bl for creating such great speaker and frankly am sure their other products have that battery capacity needed but got this on sale and it fit right into my backpack for the situation was in it was total game changes went from mess stress anger to happily singing along to my favorite songs on the off chance another courier reads this making it your routine to turn the speaker off on your way out the door will save battery will have fond memories of driving down my route playing music and singing my heart out for those precious few moments where the stress was pushed to the back of my mind luckily do not work there anymore and this speaker will not see daily use but when needed it my life was much better for it it sat next to an open door in an isuzu reach and never moved centimetres providing me with amazing sound all the while know now anything and everything might throw at it will never take it down if battery life is your concern it is valid if you want the best sound for the size of the speaker this is hard to beat and it has my doing delivered in tin can with an open door on road at may still sounding good seal of approval

i ve had this unit for several years the sound is fine as some have described the sound is definitely on the warm end of the spectrum and the high are bit lacking but the performance is better than expected at this price point anyway no one should expect super high fidelity from low cost portable speaker we use ours to stream music when we are by the pool or in the hot tub and to listen to audiobooks around the house it is great for these applications the battery lasts long time we often go week or more without needing charge the us connection is handy now that more and more devices are using this standard the bluetooth conductivity is outstanding it connect fearlessly and reliable and seems to have quite good range far less finicky and fussy than other bluetooth devices we use the unit is unable although advertised as water resistant and absolutely not speck for this my unit fell into the hot tub and floated there for two days was wondering where it went looked all over the house my spouse suggested checking the hot tub sure enough there it was expected it to be dead hope it fine do not recommend immersing the unit in water am sure we got lucky nevertheless we were impressed

i ve read lot of the one star reviews and have to say my experience is far far different following are few tidbits from my use of these bl speakers have purchased seven of these from amazon five for my daughter and her family and own two myself the e is controlled from the player you have connected to these speakers not by the speaker have cycle thou the e on my up player and the bl pick them all up no there is no separate charge cord read the ad it says exactly that don act surprised when you open the box no wall charge just us cord for charging true sterno separation for all you audiophiles out there requires minimum of three to six feet of speaker separation with home streets not likely to be achieved by any speaker small as bl but big fat so what use mine in the shower put it on ledge and now wonderful sound quality with more volume than ever need quality costs money you will always get what you pay for go cheap get cheap if you go to the vendor list and grab the cheapest one out there don be surprised when you get look alike which in not made by bl looking up number of these speakers and spreading them around the room may sound as if the signal was getting to some slower than others appearing to be law all of the speakers are getting the signal at exactly the same time what you are experiencing is the audit output copper effect ll let you look that definition up by yourself so space the speakers closer to each other battery life you will experience great deal of battery life if you keep the volume down to reasonable level crank it up to full blown party time and it will eat up battery power truly hope my comments help to answer some of the questions posed about the bl speaker no do not work for amazon or bl am simply user wishing to put light on some misunderstandings john

i live in the country and host or go to lot of bonfires and outdoor gatherings we discovered while ago that having radio wasn good enough between lack of music selection and constant commercial the bl charge is perfect party speaker solution and going to leave my impressions based on that use the speaker is plenty loud if you re on deck ratio and it placed several feet away you ll even need to turn it down to have normal conversation it doesn do as well at our large outdoor fire pit because of the bigger distances and lack of surroundings to close sound in that space is about feet from bench on one side of the fire pit to the other and in an open yard the speaker is still good just not great if you like loud commanding music as do if there is larger group of people like speaking at once for example it will not be able to overtake their voices and will be reduced to background music it will also be affected by big bonfire the waves of heat will actually distort the sound on the opposite side of the fire the sound clarity is good bass is nothing crazy but tight and does not distort or sound hollow as noted earlier volume really depends on how small space you re using it in and how many people are talking but even in the big open outdoor area it perfectly loud with only few people most importantly when turned all the way up it maintains clear clean sound and does not get distorted like other sound systems speakers do when you push them see some complaints about it being mon speaker but it sounds fine to me for what it is if want unparalleled sound e customization and other features ll buy true audiophile equipment bluetooth is easy to connect and lifesaver technology in general if you have telephone with enough bars and this speaker you can play as much music as you want bluetooth will stay connected at good distance ve walked about feet from the speaker and had no issues not many people would be streaming music very far away from the speaker imagine but it will tolerate reasonable distance charge time is definitely optimistic it advertised as being hours but ve not gotten close to that fully charged and playing continuously at full volume connected via bluetooth ve squeezed probably hours out of it which is still plenty often just let it charge from an outdoor outlet while playing music the speaker is definitely waterproof ve left it outside in the rain couple of times also let it sit on plastic chair with recess on the bottom it raised overnight and came out the next morning to find it submerged about an inch or so in puddles of water where it had sat for hours lowered right up with no issues glad tested its abilities but hate to abuse neglect any of my stuff like that if you re doing something similar to me gathering several friends around chimney on the ratio or sitting out back by the fire pit this speaker is awesome and will be louder than you want when cracked up if you re looking to entertain large group of people who are going to be noisy it not the best choice but who really listening at that point anyway

although just yesterday ordered the bl charge and so haven received it yet did some research into how the device charges on one end of the charging cable is the new and better type of us connection us and on the other the standard well familiar us connection the charging port on the speaker only accepts the new type of us connection known as us not the standard us that we are well familiar with however the unit comes supplied with sided cable that will plug into standard us port such as on most or all home and office computers and also some ac wall charges the speaker does not come with this necessary us accepting ac wall charge so if you do not have one already you have to buy one someplace otherwise simply plug it into us port on computer the new type of us connection us is better because it is the same all around that is you no longer need to worry if the jack is orientated properly before inserting it ll work no matter which way you plug it in much convenient design over the old think but am not sure that it might also work faster than the old and familiar us connection however at least as of now there is still standard us connection on the other end of the cable so perhaps the faster charging speed assuming even correct on this might only be the case when these tables have the new type of us us connections on both ends in any case as is it still better than the standard us because of not having to humble around when attempting to plug it in not only is it annoying fumbling around with the old standard us connections the fumbling can actually damage the inside of us port due to repeated attempts at trying to insert an improperly orientated connection like trying to force square peg into round hole after while the inner of the port will get bent out of shape however this is much more of problem with the standard mind us connections commonly used with mobile phone and many other small devices

the bl charge is great product found it to be initially disappointing due to the warm sound signature have found that the high aren totally accurate but they re close enough to not distract you from the music the high are present but definitely aren strong which adds to the warm signature the miss are very good and exceptionally clear for the size of this device because of this the vocal are great in most songs they are well represented unless they speak up on the high notes which is when you can hear slight distortion from accuracy however the vocal which dip into lower range sound really good as the speaker does great job not to put too much emphasis on the radiations making it sound bass and realistic if you listen to high quality his tracks you ll be able to imagine the singer right in front of you because of the presence and sound stage as for the mon speaker don listen to the critics of this new implementation because most of them either don know what they re talking about or they are just picking at it because they don like the thought of it you re not going to get sterno by using speakers inches apart like on the last model and as for separation this mon speaker separates just fine if not better than the last model especially in mid to lows the speaker gets plenty loud for the average person and it manages to maintain its dynamic all the way to just under full volume ve compared this speaker to many others such as charge x x x extreme onya and what ve found is that while the high are bit lacking in certain songs it certainly makes up for it in other departments the bass is very good in the charge the bass notes are represented accurately and it able to hit lower frequencies most portable speakers of this size can however it worth mentioning it still no sub this speaker has trouble representing very low frequencies the radiations start shaking instead of making music which for those of you who don know this doesn sound very good the battery life of this speaker wasn as advertised and found could only get hours on percent volume which isn bad but is huge deviation from the claimed hours after using this speaker for awhile and comparing it to other speakers ve actually grown fond of this unit and it become my beach toy don take any critics in this review too seriously as doubt most people are as critical as me when it comes to audit but this one gets my thumbs up future improvements would definitely require sweeter and possibly bigger battery
